mapper.insert: Insert INTO support_regular VALUES ((select NVL(MAX(regular_number),0)+1 FROM support_regular), #{supporter_id}, #{regular_amount},#{regular_bank},#{regular_account},#{regular_paymentDate},#{regular_date},default)
Insert INTO support_temporary VALUES ((select NVL(MAX(temporary_number),0)+1 FROM support_temporary), #{supporter_id}, #{temporary_amount}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'))
mapper.update: UPDATE support_regular SET regular_end = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd') WHERE supporter_id = #{supporter_id}
mapper.select: SELECT regular_end FROM support_regular WHERE supporter_id = #{supporter_id}
SELECT * from support_temporary where supporter_id=#{supporter_id} order by temporary_number desc
